Text:
The screenshots (4) are in the torrent as well, you can download them first by giving them a high priority. 

In BitTorrent:
The Adventures of Tintin -> Files -> right click on screenshot 1-4 -> priority -> high
i did, but it is so slow
In the mean time it's probably a lot faster, what otherwise might help is set the other files to "don't download".
Is this from a full BD Source??????Screenshots look great........can anyone confirm???????
